property.name: ConfigurationFilename
property.value:
[Session] Engine0=Ingest Engine1=FaceDetect Engine2=SpeechToText Engine3=MpegEncode Engine4=MMAP Engine5=Response
[Ingest] Type=Video
[FaceDetect] Type=FaceDetect Orientation=any
[SpeechToText] Type=SpeechToText LanguagePack=ENUS SpeedBias=1
[MpegEncode] Type = mpeg OutputPath = /processed-video/%session.token%/%uuid%.ts UrlBase = %session.token%/ VideoProfile = mpeg4video_h264_sd AudioProfile = mpeg4audio
[MMAP] Type = httppost Mode = atend XSLTemplate = toJSON_MMAP.xsl ContentType = application/json DestinationURL = http://idol-mmap-app:8080/vms/api/v1/videos/ Labels = name:%source.filename%, sourceUriTrack:MpegEncode.Proxy, speechToTextTrack:SpeechToText.Result
[Response] Type=response

property.name: XSLTFilename
property.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output method="xml" indent="yes"/>
<!-- Adds a <OCR> field with subfields for each area of text identified by Media Server OCR, and a complete text representation of the OCR to the document content. e.g:
<OCR> <text confidence="94" angle="0" source="image" top="421" left="483" width="104" height="17" startTime="20227000" duration="6620000">media server</text> <text confidence="92" angle="0" source="image" top="422" left="151" width="69" height="20" startTime="20227000" duration="6620000">OCR</text> </OCR> <DRECONTENT>media server OCR</DRECONTENT>
startTime and duration are represented in microseconds relative to the start of the media -->
<xsl:template match="/"> <document> <FaceDetection> <xsl:for-each select="//FaceResult"> <face> <xsl:copy-of select="face/region"/> <xsl:copy-of select="face/ellipse"/> </face> </xsl:for-each> </FaceDetection> <OCR> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record[OCRResult]"> <text> <xsl:attribute name="confidence"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/confidence"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="angle"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/angle"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="source"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/source"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="top"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/top"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="left"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/left"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="width"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/width"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="height"><xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/region/height"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:if test="timestamp"> <xsl:attribute name="startTime"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/startTime"/></xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="duration"><xsl:value-of select="timestamp/duration"/></xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="OCRResult/text"/> </text> </xsl:for-each> </OCR> <DRECONTENT> <xsl:for-each select="/autnresponse/responsedata/actions/action/output/record/OCRResult"> <xsl:value-of select="text"/><xsl:text> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </DRECONTENT> </document> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

property.name: ConfigurationFilename
property.value:
[Session] Engine0=Image Engine1=FaceDetect Engine2=OCR Engine3=Response
[Image] Type=Image
[FaceDetect] Type=FaceDetect Orientation=any
[OCR] Type=OCR Languages=en Orientation=any OCRMode=document
[Response] Type=response

template.description:
An ingest flow representing the core Connector Framework Server behavior:
- IDX/XML document parsing - KeyView Extraction - KeyView Filtering - IDOL Indexing - Clean up of temp files
template.name: Basic Ingest Flow

outputPorts.name: Failures
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'Failures'' is invalid because Output connection for port 'Failures' is not defined.
